query:
WITH deleted AS (
            DELETE FROM table_refs
            WHERE table_id = $1 AND table_ref_name = ANY($2::TEXT[])
        )
        INSERT INTO table_refs(table_id,
                              table_ref_name,
                              snapshot_id,
                              retention)
        SELECT $1, unnest($2::TEXT[]), unnest($3::BIGINT[]), unnest($4::JSONB[])
